trans-unit.source: Adds a registration progress tab to the Stats dashboard.
trans-unit.target: Adauga o fila continand evolutia inregistrarilor la statisticile din tabloul de bord.

trans-unit.source: Number of visitors who stopped at the registering step:
trans-unit.target: Numarul de vizitatori care s-au oprit la pasul de inregistrare:

trans-unit.source: Number of visitors who placed an order directly after registration:
trans-unit.target: Numarul de vizitatori care au plasat o comanda imediat dupa inregistrare:
Numarul de conturi de client create

trans-unit.source: The total number of accounts created is not in itself important information. However, it is beneficial to analyze the number created over time. This will indicate whether or not things are on the right track. You feel me?
trans-unit.target: Numarul total de conturi de client create nu este el singur important. Totusi este important sa analizezi numarul peste de-a lungul timpului. Iti va arata daca lucrurile merg in directia corecta. Nu esti de acord?

trans-unit.source: How to act on the registrations' evolution?
trans-unit.target: Cum sa reactionezi la evolutia inregistrarilor?

trans-unit.source: If you let your shop run without changing anything, the number of customer registrations should stay stable or show a slight decline.
trans-unit.target: Daca iti lasi magazinul sa mearga fara a face nici-o schimbare, numarul de clienti inregistrati va ramane stabil sau va arata o usoara scadere.

trans-unit.source: A significant increase or decrease in customer registration shows that there has probably been a change to your shop. With that in mind, we suggest that you identify the cause, correct the issue and get back in the business of making money!
trans-unit.target: O crestere sau scadere semnificativa in numarul inregistrarilor arata ca probabil a fost facuta o modificare in magazinul tau. Avand asta in minte, iti sugeram sa identifici cauza, sa corectezi eroarea si sa revenii in afacere pentru a face bani!

trans-unit.source: Here is a summary of what may affect the creation of customer accounts:
trans-unit.target: Aici ai un rezumat al lucrurilor care ar putea afecta crearea conturilor de client:

trans-unit.source: An advertising campaign can attract an increased number of visitors to your online store. This will likely be followed by an increase in customer accounts and profit margins, which will depend on customer "quality." Well-targeted advertising is typically more effective than large-scale advertising... and it's cheaper too!
trans-unit.target: O campanie publicitara poate atrage un numar mare de vizitatori catre magazinul tau online. Aceasta va fi probabil urmata de o crestere a conturilor de clienti si a profiturilor marginale, ce vor depinde de ”calitatea” clientului. Publicitatea bine-tintita are mai mult efect decat publicitatea la scala larga... si este de asemenea mai ieftina!

trans-unit.source: Specials, sales, promotions and/or contests typically demand a shoppers' attentions. Offering such things will not only keep your business lively, it will also increase traffic, build customer loyalty and genuinely change your current e-commerce philosophy.
trans-unit.target: Ofertele speciale, lichidarile, promotiile si/sau concursurile necesita atentia cumparatorilor. Oferirea de astfel de lucruri nu numai ca va vor pastra afacerea in viata, dar va contribui si la cresterea traficului, a loialitatii clientilor si la schimbarea politicii comertului.

trans-unit.source: Design and user-friendliness are more important than ever in the world of online sales. An ill-chosen or hard-to-follow graphical theme can keep shoppers at bay. This means that you should aspire to find the right balance between beauty and functionality for your online store.
trans-unit.target: Designul si interfata prietenoasa sunt mai importante ca niciodata in lumea vanzarilor online. O tema aleasa gresit sau greu de urmarit pot indeparta cumparatorii. Asta inseamna ca ar trebui sa aspiram sa gasim balanta corecta intre frumusete si functionalitate.

trans-unit.source: The total number of accounts created is not in itself important information. However, it is beneficial to analyze the number created over time. This will indicate whether or not things are on the right track.
trans-unit.target: Numarul total de conturi create nu este o informatie importanta in sine. Cu toate acestea, analiza evolutiei acestui numar in timp este utila, pentru ca indica daca lucrurile sunt sau nu pe drumul cel bun.
